articles.author: RFE/RL's Ukrainian Service
articles.title: Ukrainian Forces Hit Occupied Southern City Of Melitopol, Claim Big Russian Losses - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Ukrainian forces blasted the Russian-occupied city of Melitopol with more than a dozen explosions lighting up the sky amid conflicting reports of casualties among Russian forces in the area.
articles.content:
The Ukrainian military said on December 10 that it is engaged in intense fighting in the Donbas in eastern Ukraine as Russian forces continue to attack cities.

articles.title: Morocco down Portugal to become first ever African World Cup semi-finalists - EWN
articles.description: The Atlas Lions, also the first Arab team to make the last four, added Portugal to their list of European scalps with a resolute second-half performance.
